prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with vibrant yellow feathers and striking black accents.
Imagine a powerful bird Pokemon with lightning bolt-shaped wings and an intense gaze.
Design a legendary creature that embodies the spirit of storms and can summon thunder.
Generate a majestic Pokemon that soars high above mountains and commands the skies.
Show me a fierce and agile Pokemon that thrives in high-altitude environments.
Make a unique electric bird Pokemon with a personality that reflects confidence and pride.
Give me a Pokemon that can channel electricity through its wings while flying.

distinctive_features: Feathered body with a sleek appearance
